channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Damage to road on road heading towards winchcombe, 13th April
item.description:
An area of road that makes a big bang when you hit it. Possibly pot hole or man hole cover, didn't see it what it was but nearly ruined wheel. Heading on road down towards Winchcombe. Before you get Pardon Hill Farm/paper mill. On a bend.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 13th April
item.description:
Fly tipping/dumping - fridge outside No. 76 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham - been there for over a fortnight - could be a danger to young children as it still has a door that will close and a glass plate on the grass.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Brooklyn Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned rubbish left just outside of the High Street in Cheltenham, 13th April
item.description:
I have seen this rubbish for the past couple of months. Just outside of the high street in Cheltenham. Near Iceland.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Grosvenor Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
